title: Does anyone know what patch MSI will be on?
body:
Title.

Just curious, considering how we've got a whole new Ryze and I'm wondering if he ends up being in every game again (lol).

replies.body:
[MSI Rules](http://eune.lolesports.com/articles/2015-mid-season-invitational-rules)

>The 2015 Mid-Season Invitational will be played on the 5.7 patch. Changes to the competitive patch will be at the discretion of MSI officials.
